Uses of Class
board.Area

    • Uses of Area in board

      Methods in board that return Area 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Area Area.find(java.lang.String key, int state)
      Search for tiles whose keys equal to a particular state.
      Area Grid.find(java.lang.String key, int state)
      Returns area of tiles whose states are matched with given condition.
      Area Area.find(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object object)
      Works just like find(key, state) except state is an object here.
      Area Grid.find(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object object)
      Returns area of tiles whose objects are matched with given condition.
      Area GridTri.getAdjacentTiles(int row, int col) 
      Area Grid.getAdjacentTiles(int row, int col)
      Overloaded version of getAdjacentTiles( Tile)
      Area Grid.getAdjacentTiles(Tile tile) 
      Area Grid.getLine(int row, int col, int[] direction)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[])
      Area Grid.getLine(int row, int col, int[] direction, int length)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the length of the line can be determined.
      Area Grid.getLine(int row, int col, int[] direction, int startPoint, int endPoint)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the start and end points can be determined.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction)
      Returns Area object holding all tiles in given line.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction, int length)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the length of the line can be determined.
      Area Grid.getLine(Tile base, int[] direction, int startPoint, int endPoint)
      Overloaded version of getLine( Tile, int[]) except the start and end points can be determined.
      Area Area.getRandomTiles()
      Works just like getRandomTiles(double, double) except the number of random tiles is always presumed to be size().
      Area Grid.getRandomTiles()
      Works like getRandomTiles( int) except the number of random tiles is also random.
      Area Area.getRandomTiles(int number)
      Returns Area with some Tile objects chosen randomly.
      Area Grid.getRandomTiles(int number)
      Returns random tiles whose number is specified in parameters.
      Area Grid.getRange(int row, int col, int radius)
      Overloaded version of getRange( Tile, int)
      Area Grid.getRange(int row, int col, int radiusStart, int radiusEnd)
      Overloaded version of getRange( Tile, int, int)
      Area Grid.getRange(Tile center, int radius) 
      Area Grid.getRange(Tile center, int radiusStart, int radiusEnd)
      Gets all tile with given range.
      Constructors in board with parameters of type Area 
      Constructor and Description
      Area(Area other)
      Creates a copy Area object.
